SELECT ri.id, ri.code, ri.content, ri.images, ri.worker, ri.repair_type, ri.repair_status AS repairStatus, ri.create_date AS createDate, oi.name, oi.phone, tu.LAST_LOGIN_TIME AS lastTime, hi.address, hi.number, hi.floor, wi.name AS workerName, wi.phone AS workerPhone, wi.image AS workerImage FROM repair_info ri LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON ( tu.USER_ID = ri.user_id ) LEFT JOIN owner_info oi ON ( oi.user_id = tu.USER_ID ) LEFT JOIN houses_info hi ON ( hi.id = ri.houses_id ) LEFT JOIN worker_info wi ON ( wi.id = ri.worker ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND oi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{repairInfo.name},'%')
AND oi.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{repairInfo.phone},'%')
AND ri.repair_status = #{repairInfo.repairStatus}
ORDER BY ri.create_date

SELECT ri.id, ri.code, ri.content, ri.images, ri.worker, ri.repair_status AS repairStatus, ri.create_date AS createDate, oi.name, oi.phone, tu.LAST_LOGIN_TIME AS lastTime, hi.address, hi.number, hi.floor, wi.name AS workerName, wi.phone AS workerPhone, wi.image AS workerImage FROM repair_info ri LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON ( tu.USER_ID = ri.user_id ) LEFT JOIN owner_info oi ON ( oi.user_id = tu.USER_ID ) LEFT JOIN houses_info hi ON ( hi.id = ri.houses_id ) LEFT JOIN worker_info wi ON ( wi.id = ri.worker ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND ri.id = #{ repairId }
